creator: Baden, Max  Wilson, Woodrow
title: What are we fighting for?
source: Baden, Max  Wilson, Woodrow: What are we fighting for?  The German note: The German Government requests the President of the United States of America to take in hand the restoration of peace, acquaint all belligerent States with this request, and invite them to send plenipotentiaries for the purpose of opening negotiations .... Berlin
alternative: The German note: The German Government requests the President of the United States of America to take in hand the restoration of peace, acquaint all belligerent States with this request, and invite them to send plenipotentiaries for the purpose of opening negotiations ...
subject: Krieg 1914 1918
